name: Project Bushido
description:
Semester project for VGDC at CSUF. This is a prototype action game made in Unreal. You are an assassin sent to clear out a building. You have 4 guns and a sword at your disposal.

Controls:

WASD/Left Analog: Move

Space/Bottom Face Button: Roll

Right Click Hold/ Left Trigger: Aim

E/ Left Face Button: Interact

V/Right Face Button: Use potion

R/ Right Bumper: Reload

1-4 / D-pad: Switch weapon

Left Click / Right Trigger: Fire (Slash when not aiming)

Credits: 

Jesus Cazares - Programming, Design, Animation Programming

Leonel Cazares - Design, Level Design

Angelo D - Concept Art
